## Prerequisites

In order to access ValidMind from your company network, the following prerequisites might apply:

- To use the Developer Framework and to access the ValidMind user interface, add the `validmind.ai` domain to your allowlist (whitelist).
- If you require VPC access from your company network to ValidMind, you can [configure AWS PrivateLink](configure-aws-privatelink.qmd).

### Developer framework

Using Developer Framework and testing our sample codes requires Python 3.8+.

### Validmind Platform UI

You need to be able to access our ValidMind Platform UI in a modern browser such as Google Chrome, Apple Safari, or Mozilla Firefox.
